item.title: Goland Shortcut List

item.title: My First Post
item.description: let’s start! This is my first time using hugo. Hugo is really clean and awesome! package main import "fmt" func main(){ fmt.Println("hello go!") } #inlcude <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { cout << "Hello World!" << endl; return 0; } æµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹ä¸­æ–‡ å¥½ å¥½ å­¦ ä¹ å¤© å¤© å‘ ä¸Š ä¸­æ–‡ï¼Œè¯´ï¼š å¤äººäº‘ï¼šæœ‰æœ‹è‡ªè¿œæ–¹æ¥ï¼Œä¸äº¦ä¹ä¹ã€‚ ğŸŒˆ baidu
